column4: if a 'safe gnome session' works but my normal gnome session doesn't (in gutsy), what do I need to change to make my normal one more like the 'safe' on ?
hit e or o in the grub menu to see the options safe mode puts on the kernel
not the safe mode in the grub menu, the 'safe session' from the gpm session menu
oh i don't know where that session menu comes from
